snippet: Rescuers suspended their search on Thursday for a shipyard worker who was thrown into the Mobile River by winds that also caused a troubled Carnival cruise ship to break loose from its moorings.
abstract: Rescuers in Alabama suspend search for shipyard worker John Johnson, who was inside a guard shack that was blown into the Mobile River by winds that also caused a troubled Carnival cruise ship to break loose from its moorings.
lead_paragraph: Rescuers suspended their search on Thursday for a shipyard worker who was thrown into the Mobile River by winds that also caused a troubled Carnival cruise ship to break loose from its moorings.

headline.main: Alabama: Search for Shipyard Worker Halted
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Search For Shipyard Worker Halted
